Battle Royale Series Schedule
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Japanese DS Games Archive: Monster Farm DS 2: FAQ (basic essentials, read this first!): Battle Royale Series Schedule
By Thorr on Tuesday, September 2, 2008 - 07:00 am:

Here is the complete schedule for the Battle Royale series. Winning the tournament for the breed listed will get you a Stone Fragment for that breed which, when used in a combination, will allow your monster of that breed to break the 999 stat limit and raise it to 1500. If used in combination with a breed other than the Stone's assign breed, the monster will gain the Breed Trait for the Stone's breed.

BreedClassMonthWeek
AbyssS13
BakuA83
BeaklonSS52
CentaurSS122
ColorpandoraA111
DragonSS72
DurahanSS82
DuckenA33
FalcoS121
GaliSS62
GolemS91
HareS31
HengerSS22
JokerSS42
LesioneS73
MewA22
MocchiA44
MonolSS112
NagaSS12
OgyoA61
PanchoA72
PhoenixSS92
PiroroS103
